name: Wolfgang Voigt
description: '''Wolfgang Voigt''' (born 1961) is a German [[electronic music]] [[Disc jockey|DJ]] and [[Record producer|producer]] from [[Cologne]], known for his output under various aliases, such as [[Gas (musician)|Gas]]. He signed on numerous record labels, including [[Warp Records|Warp]], [[Harvest Records|Harvest]], [[Raster-Noton]], Force Inc, [[Astral Industries]] and [[Kompakt]]. The latter was co-founded by Voigt alongside [[Michael Mayer (musician)|Michael Mayer]] and JÃ¼rgen Paape. He is considered one of the most influential [[minimal techno]] artists.
